main event: A civilian observed a bright green light in the sky over San Antonio, Texas, on December 9, 1952.
interesting points: The light appeared to travel at a high rate of speed and made no sound., The observer noted it changed direction and speed abruptly., The shape of the object was described as pointed or wedge-shaped., The sighting lasted only 5 to 10 seconds before the object disappeared., Multiple reliable witnesses observed the event and reported similar descriptions.
sighted object: a bright green light in the sky
witness description: Reliable civilian and public officials, including a county sheriff and a city police officer.
